name: FALL IN LOVE1
description: How to playIn terms of gameplay, "FALL IN LOVE1" is a very classic game of finding differences. You need to find all the differences between 2 beautiful illustrations to pass the level! The game basically does not require any high-level operations, just use the mouse to click. Very suitable for lazy people to play.Featured ContentThe biggest feature of the game is to find different illustrations used, each level is a brand-new style of anime beauties, basically covering all types. You can always find the beauty that suits you in this game.
